languages.text: {n}Иокаста вздыхает.{/n} "Если это был особенный предмет, уникальный — это могло бы помочь. Но если в руках преступника была не самоделка, а промышленно изготовленное оружие или инструмент... Они же все одинаковые. Но мы поищем, Лорд-капитан".

{n}She sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста вздыхает.{/n} "Если это был особенный предмет, уникальный — это могло бы помочь. Но если в руках преступника была не самоделка, а промышленно изготовленное оружие или инструмент... Они же все одинаковые. Но мы поищем, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. But if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... They are all the same. But we will conduct a search, Lord Captain."

{n}Jocasta sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. But if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... They are all the same. But we will conduct a search, Lord Captain."

{n}Jocasta sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."

{n}Jocasta sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."

{n}She sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."

{n}She sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."

{n}She sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Sie seufzt.{/n} "Wenn es ein spezieller oder einzigartiger Gegenstand war, würde das helfen. Wenn der Täger aber eine industriell gefertigte Waffe benutzt hat und kein spezielles Werkzeug ... Die sehen alle gleich aus. Aber wir werden eine umfassende Suche durchführen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie seufzt.{/n} "Wenn es ein spezieller oder einzigartiger Gegenstand war, würde das helfen. Wenn der Täger aber eine industriell gefertigte Waffe benutzt hat und kein spezielles Werkzeug ... Die sehen alle gleich aus. Aber wir werden eine umfassende Suche durchführen, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Elle soupire.{/n} « Ça pourrait en effet nous aider s'il s'agit d'une arme ou d'un objet spécial. En revanche, si le criminel s'est servi d'une arme ou d'un outil fabriqués en masse... Par définition, ils se ressemblent tous et on en trouve partout. Mais nous allons procéder à des fouilles, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle soupire.{/n} « Ça pourrait en effet nous aider s'il s'agit d'une arme ou d'un objet spécial. En revanche, si le criminel s'est servi d'une arme ou d'un outil fabriqués en masse... Par définition, ils se ressemblent tous et on en trouve partout. Mais nous allons procéder à des fouilles, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}Suspira.{/n} «Si se trataba de un objeto especial o único, tal vez nos sirva, pero si el criminal usaba un arma de fabricación industrial en vez de improvisar algo... Esas son todas iguales. Sin embargo, llevaremos a cabo un registro concienzudo, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Suspira.{/n} «Si se trataba de un objeto especial o único, tal vez nos sirva, pero si el criminal usaba un arma de fabricación industrial en vez de improvisar algo... Esas son todas iguales. Sin embargo, llevaremos a cabo un registro concienzudo, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}彼女は、ため息を吐く。{/n}「それが特別な者や独特のものであれば役に立つかもしれませんが、もし犯人がその場しのぎのものではなく、工業的に製造された武器や道具を使っていたとすれば…そういったものはすべて同じです。ですが、徹底的な捜索を行います、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は、ため息を吐く。{/n}「それが特別な者や独特のものであれば役に立つかもしれませんが、もし犯人がその場しのぎのものではなく、工業的に製造された武器や道具を使っていたとすれば…そういったものはすべて同じです。ですが、徹底的な捜索を行います、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克叹了口气。{/n}“如果那是把独一无二的武器或工具的话，这或许会有效果。不过，如果凶手使用的不是临时拼凑的武器，而是制式武器或工具的话……那所有的都是一样的。不过，我们会进行彻底搜查，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克叹了口气。{/n}“如果那是把独一无二的武器或工具的话，这或许会有效果。不过，如果凶手使用的不是临时拼凑的武器，而是制式武器或工具的话……那所有的都是一样的。不过，我们会进行彻底搜查，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}İç çekiyor.{/n} "Özel ya da eşsiz bir eşyaysa bulmamızın faydası dokunur. Ancak suçlu, el yapımından ziyade sanayi üretimi bir silah ya da araç kullanıyorsa... Onların hepsi birbirinin aynıdır. Yine de detaylı bir araştırma yürüteceğiz Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs.{/n} "If it was a special or unique item, that might help. However, if the criminal was using an industrially manufactured weapon or tool instead of a makeshift one... Those are all the same. But we will conduct a thorough search, Lord Captain."
